readable.title: 3114944484_28b5bb9842
readable.content: a girl in a red shirt looks at her mom in a crowd of people sitting in white plastic chairs A group of people are facing away from the camera . A group of people with their backs to the camera and a little girl facing a lady . A little girl looking into a females face in the midst of a crowd . A young girl wearing red faces the opposite direction from the rest of a seated audience .
